name: Call of The Racket
description:
Robin, a young archaeologist, tries to unravel the mysteries of an ancient civilization, the Makalanians.

On its journey, an Racket with mysterious powers, in a hidden cave full of monsters shooting deadly bullets, join Robin to blast death back to enemies and get out of this ancient dungeon alive.

Credits

Production : Hugo Almeida, Lilian 'Lil' Paula, Caio Vinicius, Arcanjo 'Aru' Marques.

Overview : Bruno Oliveira Silva.

Production Team: Ricardo 'Rick' Rodrigues, André Theophilo.

Animation Team: Caio Vinicius, Daniel Amorim Bessa, João Victor Morais Donizetti.

Art team: Bárbara 'Barbs' Ramos, Lucas Queiroz, Tiago Caúla ,  André Theophilo.

Audiovisual Team : Rafael Bispo, Lilian Paula.

Game Design Team: Arcanjo 'Aru' Marques, Hugo Almeida, Daniel Portela Bandeira.

Marketing Team : Caio Vinicius, Lilian Paula, Beatriz Mesquita Barbosa.

Technology Team:  Álvaro 'Prof.' Carvalho, Renato Maia, Denilo Pereira Abreu, Antônio Alves Marreiras Neto,  Arthur de Freitas Almeida, Thiago Marinho de Farias.

UX/UI Team:  Felipe Sampaio do Nascimento Melquiades, Lucas Lopes Soares .

Composition and SoundFX:  Angelo Ceccatto.
